interestingcomments.content:
Professional product shots /!/ Thought ya'll might like this. I'm an photographer, editor and manage two studios. I deal with thousands of images every week, some we create for retail packaging/web, some supplied by manufacturers & their studios. I'm often"under the hood" for EXIF, meta data and the like. I get to see shots taken with everything from Phase 1 and Hasselblad to iPhone 4 (rejected, lol) 
Just got a new vendor, work is sharp. For silhouetted product photography, has everything I want. Check out the file data: Nikon D3100 with that 18-55 kit lens. Goes to show it's not necessarily the tools you use!
